10gbhosting: KVMs with 20TB of Bandwidth in London, England!

10gbhosting, high bandwidth, london, uk March 13, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Welcome, 10gbhosting!  This is their first foray onto LowEndBox.

They offer a variety of services (Linux/Windows-based shared, reseller, managed WordPress, managed/unmanaged, and dedicated servers) and are based in the UK.  Nikhil contacted us with a whole range of offerings:

  • KVM 2GB RAM with 20TB of bandwidth (!) VPS for $8.99/mo!
  • And VPSes at every major memory break point up to 64GB of RAM at $89.99/mo!

20TB on a VPS is a lot of transit, and with 2GB of RAM (or more depending on the package), you’ve got the resources to run nearly anything.

They are registered in United Kingdom (12669496). Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept credit/debit cards, net banking, internet banking, and PayPal..

Here’s a little about 10gbhosting in their own words:

10gbhosting is a leading web hosting service provider in the UK. 10gbhosting.co.uk is part of the Register Group (Byte Technologies Ltd). Our focus is to deliver optimal website speed, higher performance with latest technology, regular network maintenance & customer support. We provide excellent customer service & customer satisfaction is our belief. We aim to help all startup, small to medium scale business & corporate businesses to grow & build their online presence. All of our hosting plans are bundled with all necessary and essential features to provide seamless performance, faster-loading speed, and advanced security to deliver a better user experience. We are confident about our web hosting services. So, we offer 30-days moneyback guarantee, you can test our services & support anytime.

Remember that the LEB community would love to hear about your experience in the comments section below!
